title: Father's Kingdom

tokens.lyric: We're on our way to the Father's Kingdom,

lines.raw: [D]We're on our way to the Father's Kingdom,

tokens.lyric: We're on our way to the promised land,

lines.raw: [G]We're on our way to the promised land,

tokens.lyric: He's going to lead you all to freedom,

lines.raw: [D]He's going to lead you all to freedom,

tokens.lyric: We'll pray and take Him by the hand.

lines.raw: [A7]We'll pray and take Him by the hand.

tokens.lyric: From the beginning to the ending,

lines.raw: [D]From the beginning to the ending,

tokens.lyric: From the last moment to the start,

lines.raw: [G]From the last moment to the start,

tokens.lyric: God has been pouring out His spirit,

lines.raw: [D]God has been pouring out His spirit,

tokens.lyric: He has been calling from His heart.

lines.raw: [A7]He has been calling from His heart.

tokens.lyric: So every man shall meet his father

lines.raw: [D]So every man shall meet his father

tokens.lyric: As from a seed will grow a tree,

lines.raw: [G]As from a seed will grow a tree,

tokens.lyric: So from the darkness comes the daylight

lines.raw: [D]So from the darkness comes the daylight

tokens.lyric: When blinded men shall learn to see.

lines.raw: [A7]When blinded men shall learn to see.

tokens.lyric: Blue, red and gold and every color,

lines.raw: [D]Blue, red and gold and every color,

tokens.lyric: Blue, red and gold and every day,

lines.raw: [G]Blue, red and gold and every day,

tokens.lyric: Waking at dawn we see the sunlight

lines.raw: [D]Waking at dawn we see the sunlight

tokens.lyric: Spread down the path a yellow ray.

lines.raw: [A7]Spread down the path a yellow ray.

tokens.lyric: Give me your hand and we'll go forward

lines.raw: [D]Give me your hand and we'll go forward

tokens.lyric: Into a new world full of joy

lines.raw: [G]Into a new world full of joy

tokens.lyric: Bring down the curtains on the old world

lines.raw: [D]Bring down the curtains on the old world

tokens.lyric: True love for every girl and boy.

lines.raw: [A7]True love for every girl and boy.

source:
{title: Father's Kingdom}
{key: D}

{section: Chorus}
[D]We're on our way to the Father's Kingdom,
[G]We're on our way to the promised land,
[D]He's going to lead you all to freedom,
[A7]We'll pray and take Him by the hand.

{section: Verse 1}
[D]From the beginning to the ending,
[G]From the last moment to the start,
[D]God has been pouring out His spirit,
[A7]He has been calling from His heart.

{section: Verse 2}
[D]So every man shall meet his father
[G]As from a seed will grow a tree,
[D]So from the darkness comes the daylight
[A7]When blinded men shall learn to see.

{section: Verse 3}
[D]Blue, red and gold and every color,
[G]Blue, red and gold and every day,
[D]Waking at dawn we see the sunlight
[A7]Spread down the path a yellow ray.

{section: Verse 4}
[D]Give me your hand and we'll go forward
[G]Into a new world full of joy
[D]Bring down the curtains on the old world
[A7]True love for every girl and boy.
